title: MC_Home (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK MC_Home
MC_Home causes the axis to perform the âsearch homeâ sequence.
The details of this sequence are manufacturer dependent and can be set by the axis parameters.
The
Position
input is used to set the absolute position when a reference signal is detected.
The function block terminates with
standstill
.
Note
This function block does not support forecasts that are set up by
SMC_SetForecast
.

rows.Name: Execute
rows.Comment: Rising edge: Starts the execution of the function block.

rows: Absolute position when the reference signal is detected [u].
TRUE: Execution of function block has not been finished.
TRUE: Command has been aborted by another command.
TRUE: Error has occurred within the function block.
